document.full_text: europe's successful ryder cup captain colin montgomerie has jumped to the defense of world number one lee westwood and said if u.s.-based players were concerned about the european resurgence in the world rankings they should join tiger woods and phil mickelson in playing more tournaments overseas.
document.title: montgomerie defends westwood, tells u.s. players to travel more
